Name: Hunger
About the game: Hunger in Los Angeles is an immersive journalistic experience set in the heart of the city, where the indigent are trying to survive on an over-strained food distribution system. By embedding audio that was captured from the First Unitarian Church in an immersive 3D Unity scene, we become witness to a distressing event that unfolds. Hunger in Los Angeles first premiered at Sundance, 2012.
Meta Title: Hunger: Feb 1, 2017, Emblematic Group and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Hunger? Check out the release date (Feb 1, 2017), developer insights from Emblematic Group, and a complete game summary.
